EmailTemplate.name: 202101_Americas-EMEAI_ATR_Webinar_Avionics-Conference_Teams.Auto-Responder
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for the ATR Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name}}
Thank you for registering for the Honeywell Aerospace ATR Conference (details below).
ATR Conference Avionics Webinar – Americas/EMEAI January 28, 2021 7:00-9:00am MST
In order to facilitate a more interactive discussion, this webinar will be held through a Microsoft Teams meeting. Please look forward to an invitation to the meeting from me the day before the event.
Thank you, Jeff Kucharski
jeff.a.kucharski@honeywell.com
